# This is the pipeline where Pukara enforces the use of conventional-commits at the CI level.
# At the local machine level, the pre-commit framework is responsible for enforcing this,
# but it can be easily bypassed.

name: Lint Commit Messages
on: [pull_request]

permissions:
  contents: read
  pull-requests: read

jobs:
  commitlint:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - uses: wagoid/commitlint-github-action@v6.1.2
